name: @monstermakes/larry-environment
description: Tooling to build and maintaing larry cloud applications.

scripts.start: echo '=> This is a library project and therefore has no server component. Exiting...' && exit 0
scripts.test: echo '=> Verifying...' && npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test-unit-coverage
scripts.clean: echo '=> Cleaning built assets...' && rm -rf .nyc_output coverage
scripts.test-unit-coverage: echo '=> Running Tests w/ Coverage...' && nyc npm run test-unit && nyc --reporter=html report && nyc --lines 0 --functions 0 --branches 0 --per-file check-coverage
